chorus: Get up, stand up, stand up for your rights!
Get up, stand up, stand up for your rights!
Get up, stand up, stand up for your rights!
Get up, stand up, don't give up the fight!

second_verse1: Great God will come from the skies
first_verse2: It's not all that glitters is gold
second_verse2: But if you know what life is worth
first_verse3: Alf the story has never been told
So now you see the light, eh!
Stand up for your rights. Come on!
second_verse3: You will look for yours on earth
